＠Shopkeeper,H00141
「Thank you for your patronage...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00142
「Will you buy something else...?」

「Actually, maybe not that...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00143
「Is that so...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00144

label	shopitem_buy_unnamed

select sel,"Buy","Never mind"
if sel=0	then	goto shopitem_buy1
if sel=1	then	goto shopitem_buy2

label	shopitem_buy1_unnamed

if _MONEY < _PRICE then goto shopitem_buy3

se	0,"sound\se\アイテムショップ_レジの音.wav",play_once
minimoney_sub	_PRICE
item_get	_ITEM
if _ITEM<200 then item_priceup	_ITEM
shop_buy_count_work=shop_buy_count_work+1
shop_buy_count=shop_buy_count+1
if _ITEM>=200 then item_soldout	_ITEM,_TRUE
if _ITEM=500 then @suika_love_up

＠Shopkeeper,H00141
「Thank you for your patronage...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00142
「Was there anything else you wanted...?」

goto	shopitem_end_unnamed

label	shopitem_buy2_unnamed

＠Itsuki
「Actually, maybe not that...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00143
「Is that so...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00144
「If you can... Please buy something...」

goto	shopitem_end_unnamed

label	shopitem_buy3_unnamed
＠Itsuki
「I don't have enough money...」

goto	shopitem_end_unnamed

label	shopitem_buy4_unnamed

＠Itsuki
「Actually, maybe not...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00143
「Is that so...」

＠Shopkeeper,H00144
「If you can... Please buy something...」

goto	shopitem_end_unnamed

label	shopitem_end_unnamed

return
